languages.text: "В этом уже нет смысла. Погибни они недавно, и будь я волчьим жрецом, я бы вооружился Клыком Моркаи и извлек их прогеноиды, импланты, хранящие память крови Всеотца. На Фенрисе их пересадили бы молодым Волкам, и доблесть моих братьев продолжила бы жить в них. Но тела пролежали здесь слишком долго, а значит, их надо просто похоронить в пламени, защитить от падальщиков и недостойных рук".

"There is no point now. If they had died recently, and if I were a Wolf Priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."
languages.original_text: "В этом уже нет смысла. Погибни они недавно, и будь я волчьим жрецом, я бы вооружился Клыком Моркаи и извлек их прогеноиды, импланты, хранящие память крови Всеотца. На Фенрисе их пересадили бы молодым Волкам, и доблесть моих братьев продолжила бы жить в них. Но тела пролежали здесь слишком долго, а значит, их надо просто похоронить в пламени, защитить от падальщиков и недостойных рук".

If they had died recently, and if I were a wolf priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

"There is no point now. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

"There is no point now. If they had died recently, and if I were a wolf priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

"There is no point now. If they had died recently, and if I were a wolf priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

languages.text: “这么做已经没有意义了。如果他们是最近才死的，而如果我刚好又是野狼祭司，我会用我的莫凯之牙挖出他们的基因收存腺。那件植入物含有全父的鲜血与记忆。如果这是在芬里斯的话，这些基因收存腺会被植入到年轻的太空野狼体内，而我兄弟们的勇气会在他们身上继续流传。然而，他们的躯体已经在这里躺了太久，所以必须让烈焰带走他们，保护他们免受腐食动物与宵小之徒侵害。”
languages.original_text: "There is no point now. If they had died recently, and if I were a Wolf Priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

traits.locale_text: “这么做已经没有意义了。如果他们是最近才死的，而如果我刚好又是野狼祭司，我会用我的莫凯之牙挖出他们的基因收存腺。那件植入物含有全父的鲜血与记忆。如果这是在芬里斯的话，这些基因收存腺会被植入到年轻的太空野狼体内，而我兄弟们的勇气会在他们身上继续流传。然而，他们的躯体已经在这里躺了太久，所以必须让烈焰带走他们，保护他们免受腐食动物与宵小之徒侵害。”

languages.text: 「今となっては無意味だ。ついさっき死んだのなら、しかも俺が牙狼法師なら、モルカイの牙で武装してこいつらのプロゲノイド、つまり全知の父の記憶を含む組織を抽出できたんだが。フェンリスでは、そうやって抽出したプロゲノイドを若い狼に移すんだ。同胞の武勇はこうして受け継がれていくはずだった。ところが、この遺体は野ざらしで時間が経ちすぎてる。ハイエナや不敬な手から守るためにも、ただ炎にくべてやるのがいい」
languages.original_text: "There is no point now. If they had died recently, and if I were a Wolf Priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

traits.locale_text: 「今となっては無意味だ。ついさっき死んだのなら、しかも俺が牙狼法師なら、モルカイの牙で武装してこいつらのプロゲノイド、つまり全知の父の記憶を含む組織を抽出できたんだが。フェンリスでは、そうやって抽出したプロゲノイドを若い狼に移すんだ。同胞の武勇はこうして受け継がれていくはずだった。ところが、この遺体は野ざらしで時間が経ちすぎてる。ハイエナや不敬な手から守るためにも、ただ炎にくべてやるのがいい」

languages.text: «Ahora no tiene sentido. Si hubieran muerto de forma reciente y yo fuera Sacerdote Lobo, habría usado el Colmillo de Morkai para extraer sus progenoides, los implantes que albergan el recuerdo de la sangre del Padre de todas las cosas. Al llevarlos a Fenris, se les habrían implantado a Lobos jóvenes y el valor de mis hermanos viviría en su interior. Pero sus cuerpos yacen aquí desde hace demasiado tiempo y deberían ser entregados a las llamas para protegerlos de los carroñeros y de las manos indignas».
languages.original_text: "There is no point now. If they had died recently, and if I were a Wolf Priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora no tiene sentido. Si hubieran muerto de forma reciente y yo fuera Sacerdote Lobo, habría usado el Colmillo de Morkai para extraer sus progenoides, los implantes que albergan el recuerdo de la sangre del Padre de todas las cosas. Al llevarlos a Fenris, se les habrían implantado a Lobos jóvenes y el valor de mis hermanos viviría en su interior. Pero sus cuerpos yacen aquí desde hace demasiado tiempo y deberían ser entregados a las llamas para protegerlos de los carroñeros y de las manos indignas».

languages.text: « Il est trop tard. S'ils étaient morts récemment et si j'étais un Prêtre Loup, je me serais armé du Croc de Morkaï pour extraire leurs progénoïdes, car c'est dans ces implants que réside la mémoire du sang du Père de Tous. Ils auraient ensuite été transplantés dans de jeunes Loups de Fenris pour que la bravoure de mes frères perdure en eux. Mais leurs corps gisent ici depuis trop longtemps. Nous allons donc simplement les livrer aux flammes, afin de les protéger des charognards et de la convoitise des impies. »
languages.original_text: "There is no point now. If they had died recently, and if I were a Wolf Priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

traits.locale_text: « Il est trop tard. S'ils étaient morts récemment et si j'étais un prêtre-loup, je me serais armé du Croc de Morkaï pour extraire leurs progénoïdes, car c'est dans ces implants que réside la mémoire du sang du Père de Tous. Ils auraient ensuite été transplantés dans de jeunes Loups de Fenris pour que la bravoure de mes frères perdure en eux. Mais leurs corps gisent ici depuis trop longtemps. Nous allons donc simplement les livrer aux flammes, afin de les protéger des charognards et de la convoitise des impies. »

languages.text: "Das wäre jetzt sinnlos. Wären sie vor Kurzem gestorben und wäre ich ein Wolfspriester, hätte ich mich mit dem Fangzahn von Morkai ausgerüstet und ihre Progenoiden entnommen, die Implantate mit der Erinnerung an das Blut des Allvaters. Auf Fenris wären sie jungen Wölfen eingepflanzt worden, und der Mut meiner Brüder hätte in ihnen weitergelebt. Aber Ihre Körper liegen hier schon zu lange und sollten einfach den Flammen übergeben werden, um sie vor Plünderern und unwürdigen Händen zu schützen."
languages.original_text: "There is no point now. If they had died recently, and if I were a Wolf Priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

traits.locale_text: "Das wäre jetzt sinnlos. Wären sie vor Kurzem gestorben und wäre ich ein Wolfspriester, hätte ich mich mit dem Fangzahn von Morkai ausgerüstet und ihre Progenoiden entnommen, die Implantate mit der Erinnerung an das Blut des Allvaters. Auf Fenris wären sie jungen Wölfen eingepflanzt worden, und der Mut meiner Brüder hätte in ihnen weitergelebt. Aber Ihre Körper liegen hier schon zu lange und sollten einfach den Flammen übergeben werden, um sie vor Plünderern und unwürdigen Händen zu schützen."

languages.text: "Anlamı yok ki. Yakın zamanda ölmüş olsalar, ben de Kurt Rahip olsam Morkai'ın Dişi'ni alıp Yücebaba'nın kan hafızasını taşıyan implantları, yani progenoitlerini çıkarırdım. Fenris'te onları genç Kurtlara takarlardı, böylece kardeşlerimin yiğitliği onlarla beraber yaşamaya devam ederdi. Fakat cesetleri burada uzun süre beklemiş. Onları leşçillere ve değersiz ellere bırakmamak için hemen alevlere teslim etmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "There is no point now. If they had died recently, and if I were a Wolf Priest, I would have armed myself with the Fang of Morkai and extracted their progenoids, the implants containing the memory of the Allfather's blood. On Fenris, they would have been transplanted into young Wolves, and the valour of my brothers would have lived on in them. But their bodies have lain here too long, so they should simply be given to the flames, to protect them against scavengers and unworthy hands."

traits.locale_text: "Artık bir anlamı yok. Yakın zamanda ölmüş olsalar ve ben bir kurt rahip olsam Morkai'ın Dişi'ni alıp Yücebaba'nın kanının hatırasını taşıyan implantları, yani progenoitlerini çıkarırdım. Fenris'te onları genç Kurtlara takarlardı ve kardeşlerimin yiğitliği onlarla birlikte yaşamaya devam ederdi. Fakat bedenleri burada uzun süre beklemiş. Onları hurdacılardan ve değersiz ellerden korumak için hemen alevlere teslim etmeliyiz."
